project.name: All Plugins (repo)
project.description: A p2 repo (update site) bundle of all JBoss Tools plugins -

project.name: JBoss Archive Tools
project.description: For incremental archiving and packaging

project.name: JBoss AS Tools
project.description: For running deploying to, and configuring JBoss AS

project.name: JBoss BIRT Tools
project.description: Hibernate and Seam extensions for Eclipse BIRT

project.name: JBoss BPEL Editor
project.description: JBoss BPEL Editor

project.name: Context and Dependency Injection Tools
project.description: Context and Dependency Injection Tools

project.name: Common Frameworks
project.description: Common JBoss Tools Frameworks, used by several JBoss Tools components

project.name: Drools IDE
project.description: For Drools Rules and Drools Ruleflow

project.name: JBoss ESB Tools
project.description: Project wizards, editors and deployment JBoss's Enterprise Service Bus

project.name: Project Examples
project.description: Tooling for easy installation of Examples + Project Examples from the JBoss Community

project.name: Flow Languages Common Tools
project.description: Flow Languages Common Tools, used by jBPM component

project.name: FreeMarker IDE
project.description: Syntax highlighting Editor for Freemarker files

project.name: Hibernate Tools
project.description: Hibernate wizards, query editor, reverse engineering and more

project.name: jBPM + jBPM Convert
project.description: Support for jBPM, including conversion from BPMN files

project.name: JMX Tools
project.description: Java Management Extensions (JMX) Console in Eclipse

project.name: JBoss Tools JSF
project.description: JBoss Tools JSF - see also JST and VPE components

project.name: JBoss Tools Java Standard Tools
project.description: JBoss Tools Java Standard Tools - see also JSF and VPE components

project.name: JBoss Maven Tools
project.description: Maven support in Eclipse (m2eclipse)

project.name: ModeShape JCR REST Tools
project.description: Provides a resource publishing and unpublishing capability to ModeShape repositories

project.name: Pi Calculus for SOA
project.description: Provides Pi Calculus for SOA

project.name: Portlet Tools
project.description: For supporting JBoss Portal and JSR-286 portlets

project.name: JBoss Profiler
project.description: Provides profiling for JBoss

project.name: Seam Tools
project.description: For creating Seam Components and Projects

project.name: Smooks Tools
project.description: transformation editor

project.name: Struts Tools
project.description: For Struts 1.x framework

project.name: Teiid Designer
project.description: To create metadata models that describe your enterprise information systems

project.name: JBoss AS TPTP Tools
project.description: TPTP support for JBoss AS servers

project.name: Visual Page Editor
project.description: Visual Page Editor - see also JST and JSF components

project.name: JBoss WS Tools
project.description: Enables Web Services support in Eclipse for JBoss WS

project.name: XulRunner
project.description: Provides a common back-end for XUL applications

project.name: Sources
project.description: JBoss Tools - all sources (excluding tests)
